data.title: Towards a History of Egyptology: Proceedings of the Egyptological Section of the 8th Eshs Conference in London, 2018 (Investigatio Orientis) 9783963270802, 3963270802
data.meta_description: Ancient Egypt has for centuries occupied a prominent place in popular imaginations and scholarly research agendas. While...
